entry.title: Saturday: Periods of light snow. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending this morning then cloudy. Risk of freezing rain early this morning. Wind southeast 20 km/h. High plus 5. Wind chill minus 7 this morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM ADT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Showers. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Rain showers beginning this evening. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Fog patches developing this evening. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 05:00 AM ADT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Showers. High 7.
entry.summary: Showers ending early in the morning then clearing. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High 7. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM ADT Saturday 18 March 2023
